description:
Manage and configure RØDE devices.


[New Feature] Added live audio metering for RØDE audio devices when plugged into RØDE Central (iOS/Android/Windows only).
[Improvement] Added the ability to disable optional firmware updates and continue to use devices with older firmware versions (when compatible).
[Bug Fix] Fixed an issue where changing Gain Assist on Wireless PRO and Wireless GO (Gen 3) could cause MANUAL mode to revert to 0dB.
